name: node-exercices
description: Do Write simple Express server that listens on port 3000 (use dotenv to specify the port) Create a dummy "database" of planets using a let variable. (You will use this data in further exercises.) Configure your app (app.use()) to: accept JSON from the Client log the Client's requests Use Dummy database with initial data:   type Planet = {     id: number,     name: string,   };
